group_1.textLeft: And you know what? All the guys in class@were talking about it!
"Everyone knows that guys are drawn to@maids!"
So I thought, maybe Hayato likes them too.@That's why I'm here to check it out!

group_1.textRight: So THAT'S why you wanted to go to a@maid cafe.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah! Thanks for coming with me!

group_1.textRight: It's no problem. I was kinda interested too!
I'm terribly sorry to keep you waiting,@Master. Here is your Lovely Rice Omelet.

group_1.textLeft: "Await"? That's a stuffy way to say it.@Is that how maids talk?
I guess some maids are different than@others?

group_1.textRight: Do you want me to draw something with@ketchup?

group_1.textLeft: Oh, I want pom-poms! Ya know, like@we use in cheerleading?
Oh my gosh! These look sooo good!
Aimi, what do you want her to draw?
Oh, right!
What DO I want her to draw? All I can think@of is...Hayato.
[chara:302301:effect_emotion_angry_0][se:7219_strain]Awww! She wrote his name on my omelet!@Super adorbs!

group_1.textRight: Should you have her add a heart?

group_1.textLeft: Excuse me?!

group_1.textRight: You like those kinds of things, right?

group_1.textLeft: W-well, yes! But still!
[chara:302301:effect_emotion_angry_0][se:7219_strain]Two hearts?!

group_1.textRight: I observed your adoration and put on a little@extra.

group_1.textLeft: Hearts...and H-Hayato's name...ohhh...@[chara:302301:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:302301:cheek_2][chara:302301:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json:motion_100][chara:302301:lipSynch_1][chara:302301:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Hee hee...hee heeeeee...

group_1.textCenter: Uh oh, here we go. You really set her off@now.

group_1.textRight: I will return with your drinks. Please@wait a moment.

group_1.textLeft: They're not drawn on anyone else's omelets.@Only yours, Hayato!

group_1.textCenter: Aimi! Come in, Aimi! Earth to Aimi!

group_1.textLeft: Because, you know...
I could only ever be a maid for you, Hayato!

group_1.textCenter: Here's your Fizzy Fizz Cream Soda and@Brr-Brr Chilly Iced Tea.

group_1.textRight: "I'm so glad I get to have a maid this pretty@attending to my every need."

group_1.textLeft: Oh, like that! It'd be just like that!
[chara:302301:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Ah?!
